{{zp0}}

{{zp0}} represents the 'person' aspect of the {{zp3}}. {{zp0}} is the human role in the transaction. The {{zp0}} repository maintains the parties involved whose identities are carefully hashed.

{{#skel}}
{{/skel}}
{{#skel}}

{{zp1}}

{{zp1}}s are exchanged between {{zp0}}(s) for money or other {{zp1}}(s). {{zp1}}(s) are tangible or intangible. {{zp1}}(s) have a perceived monetary value.

 

{{#skel}}

{{zp2}}

{{zp2}} represents the contract between the {{zp0}}(s) involved, negotiated value of the {{zp1}}, terms and conditions, policies and warranty.

{{#skel}}
{{/skel}}
{{#skel}}

{{zp3}}

{{zp3}}(s) are transactions between parties on {{zp1}}(s) based on {{zp2}}. {{zp3}}(s) are append only. {{zp3}}(s) maintain the hash keys of the parties, {{zp1}}(s) and {{zp2}}(s) involved.
{{/skel}}
{{#skel}}
{{/skel}}
{{#skel}}

{{zp4}}

Ledger analytics.
{{/skel}}
